Literature.Title: Novel β-Hairpin Antimicrobial Peptides Containing the β-Turn Sequence of -RRRF- Having High Cell Selectivity and Low Incidence of Drug Resistance.
Literature.Author: Li B, Ouyang X, Ba Z, Yang Y, Zhang J, Liu H, Zhang T, Zhang F, Zhang Y, Gou S, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>256 µM,Human kidney proximal tubule HK-2 cells:IC50=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM)
